# Plots with ggplot2

We are going to make plots in R using the ggplot2 package from the tidyverse.

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)

```

# California National Parks Data

```{r}

ca_np <- read_csv(here("data/ca_np.csv"))

```
